title: Postal.2.LinuxGame.Rip-Trice
description:
Title: Postal 2
Developer: Running With Scissors
Genre: Modern First-Person Shooter
Release Date: Apr,2003
Supplier: GodFearMe
Supply Date: Feb,2007
Rar Count: 38 x 15MB

Game information:
Ultraviolent FPS that got banned in several countries, and sued by the US Postal Service. Powered by the Unreal engine.

Minimum Requirements:
Operating System: 2.2.x or better Linux kernel with glibc-2.1 or later and X-Windows (XFree86 3.3.x or later)
Processor: 1.0 GHz x86 Processor
Memory: 128 MB
Disc Space: 1.4 GB
CD Rom: 8 x CD Rom
Graphics Card: Hardware Accelerated 3D Graphics card with 64 MB video memory
Sound Card: OSS Compatible

For review,screenshots etc:

Install Notes:
Unrar
Start game with ./postal2
